department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Mast Extension Kit to relocate antennas on user's vest
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure Mast Extension Kit- personal antenna relocation kits for use in functionally relocating radio mounted antennas to other locations on the wearer’s loading-bearing vest.

## Goods or Service Description
The Department of National Defence requires a Mast Extension Kit to facilitate the functional relocation of radio-mounted antennas to other locations on the wearer's loading-bearing vest.

## Industry Coding
*   UNSPSC Code: 43221706 - Radio antennas
*   UNSPSC Description: Radio antennas

## Contract Details
*   Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Regions of Opportunity: Ontario (except NCR)
*   Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except NCR)
